    News

    Aug 5, 2018 New paper SLANG: Fast Structured Covariance Approximations for Bayesian Deep Learning with Natural Gradient accepted for NIPS 2018.
    Jul 12, 2018 New paper on Fast yet Simple Natural-Gradient Descent for Variational Inference in Complex Models out. Will be presented at ISITA 2018.
    Jun 28, 2018 I will be a TA in the two-day tutorial on Approximate Bayesian Inference at the Data Science Summer School 2018.
    Jun 13, 2018 New paper on Fast and Scalable Bayesian Deep Learning by Weight-Perturbation in Adam out. Will be presented at ICML 2018.
    May 24, 2018 I gave a one-hour introduction to the field of Bayesian Deep Learning at the headquarters of Works Applications.
    Nov 15, 2017 New paper on the Variational Adaptive Newton Method out.
    Mar 21, 2017 I joined the RIKEN Center for Advanced Intelligence Project as a research assistant, where I will be working with Emtiyaz Khan in the Approximate Bayesian Inference Team.
    Feb 17, 2017 I officially obtained my MSc in Applied Physics and Mathematics from NTNU.
    Dec 27, 2016 I submitted my MSc Thesis. A big thanks to my supervisor Prof. HÃ¥vard Rue.
    Jun 13, 2016 I will be a summer intern at the Norwegian Computing Center, working on methods for automated fraud detection.
    Jun 15, 2015 I will be a summer intern at the Energy Markets division at Norsk Hydro, developing trading strategies for energy markets.
    Jun 9, 2014 I will be a summer intern at If P&C Insurance, analyzing customer behavior.
